Subroutine sce_init

215 : 
216 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
217 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
218 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
219 : 
220 :       subroutine sce_init ()
221 :       use sce_mod
222 :       implicit none
223 : 
224 :       INTEGER :: i_, j_, ios
225 :       INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: paropt(:)
226 :       CHARACTER(3)   :: str
227 :       CHARACTER(60)  :: informat
228 : 
229 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
230 : ! FIND AND OPEN PARAMETER FILE, shuffle.par
231 : ! ESTABLISH NUMBER OF PARAMETERS npar
232 : 
233 :       open(kfile_shufflepar, file=sfile_shufflepar(1:len_trim(sfile_shufflepar)), status='old')
234 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,*)
235 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,*)
236 :       npar = 0
237 :       do
238 :         read(kfile_shufflepar,*,iostat=ios) str
239 :         if (ios .lt. 0) exit
240 :         if (str .eq. 'var') npar = npar + 1
241 :       enddo
242 :       rewind(kfile_shufflepar)
243 :       allocate(parname(npar))
244 :       allocate(parval(npar))
245 :       allocate(parmin(npar))
246 :       allocate(parmax(npar))
247 :       allocate(paropt(npar))
248 : 
249 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
250 : !  LOAD INITIAL PARAMETER VALUES AND PARAMETER RANGES
251 : 
252 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,'(i1)') command
253 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,*) ncomp
254 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,*) ncompmin
255 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,*) resolution
256 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,*) patience
257 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,*) alpha
258 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,*) focus
259 :       read(kfile_shufflepar,'(a60)') informat
260 :       do i_ = 1, npar
261 :         read(kfile_shufflepar,informat) parname(i_), parval(i_), parmin(i_), &
262 :      &                                  parmax(i_), paropt(i_)
263 :       enddo
264 :       close(kfile_shufflepar)
265 : 
266 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
267 : !  CALCULATE NUMBER OF OPTIMISABLE PARAMETERS
268 : 
269 :       nopt = sum(paropt(:))
270 :       mopt = 2 * nopt + 1                         ! SCE VARIABLE m
271 :       ncomp = MAX(ncomp, Ceiling(1.d0 + 2.d0 ** nopt / (1.d0 + 2.d0 * nopt)))  ! number of complexes after Muttil(2004) or from shuffle.par
272 :       sopt = mopt * ncomp                         ! SCE VARIABLE s
273 :       qopt = nopt + 1                             ! CCE VARIABLE q
274 :       ncomp2 = ncomp
275 :       allocate(optid(nopt))
276 :       allocate(shufflevar(npar,sopt))
277 :       allocate(ofvec(sopt))
278 :       allocate(wgt(mopt))
279 :       allocate(cv_(nopt))
280 :       allocate(ranarr(nopt))
281 :       allocate(dataarray(nopt*8+1,nopt+1))
282 :       allocate(shufflevar2(npar))
283 :       allocate(parentsid(qopt))
284 :       allocate(objfunsub(qopt))
285 :       allocate(invarsub(npar,qopt))
286 :       allocate(selected(mopt))
287 :       allocate(centroid(npar))
288 :       allocate(newpoint(npar))
289 : 
290 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
291 : ! INITIALISE OUTPUT FORMAT STRING
292 : ! INTRODUCED BY STAN TO HAVE ONE COLUMN PER PARAMETER AND ONE FOR OF
293 : 
294 :       write(str,'(i2)') npar + 1                  ! internal write to convert from integer to string
295 :       outformat = '('//str//'e34.25)'             ! includes a column for each parameter and a column for the value of OF
296 : 
297 : !     * ADDED BY STAN TO WRITE shufflevar AND ofvec OF LAST LOOP TO FILE
298 :       write(str,'(i3)') sopt                      ! internal write to convert from number to string
299 :       loopformat = '('//str//'e34.25)'            ! includes a column for each set 
300 : 
301 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
302 : ! INITIALISE optid: THE INDEX OF THOSE PARAMETERS THAT ARE OPTIMISABLE
303 : 
304 :       j_ = 0
305 :       do i_ = 1, npar
306 :         if (paropt(i_) .gt. 0) then
307 :           j_ = j_ + 1
308 :           optid(j_) = i_
309 :         endif
310 :       enddo
311 : 
312 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
313 : ! INITIALISE optid: THE INDEX OF THOSE PARAMETERS THAT ARE OPTIMISABLE
314 : ! ASSIGN PROBABILITY WEIGHTS
315 : 
316 :       do i_ = 1, mopt
317 :         wgt(i_) = 2.d0 * (mopt + 1.d0 - i_) / mopt / (mopt + 1.d0)
318 :       enddo
319 : 
320 :       return
321 :       end subroutine sce_init
